Meta.description: Don't stress about gift ideas! Create wish boards, share with friends, and make every occasion special. NoriuTo - your ultimate wish board app.

HomePage.title: Make gifting easy and fun.
HomePage.description: Create wish boards, share with friends, and make every occasion special.
HomePage.board1description: New running shoes for the season, resistance bands upgrade, and that sleek fitness watch I've been eyeing.

HomePage.board3description: A new lens for my camera, sketchbook for ideas, and a pottery class I've been meaning to try.
